title: Oppo announces Hasselblad camera partnership for upcoming Find X5 series
content:
The lines between Oppo and OnePlus are set to blur even further with confirmation that the Find X5 and future Find X series devices will come with Hasselblad tuning and performance improvements.

more…

The post Oppo announces Hasselblad camera partnership for upcoming Find X5 series appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Like OnePlus before, Oppo has now confirmed a "strategic partnership" with Swedish camera and lens maker Hasselblad for the upcoming Find X5.
